input_text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Rachel: Hey Jack. How were your classes this semester?
Lisa: They were not too bad. I really liked my poli-sci class.
Rachel: Would you consider it your favorite class?
Lisa: I don't know if I would call it my favorite, but it ranks up there.
Rachel: What class was your favorite then?
Lisa: I took a business communication class last year and it was terrific.
Rachel: I never took that yet. If that was your favorite, I think I will check it out.

Now write a summary of the conversation:
input_text.Response A: Jack tells Rachel that business communication is his favorite last year and Rachel will check it.
input_text.Response B: The conversation is between Rachel and Lisa discussing Lisa's classes and her favorite. Lisa says her poli-sci class was not too bad, but she really liked her business communication class. She clarifies that she doesn't know if her poli-sci class was her favorite, but it was up there. Rachel asks what Lisa's favorite class was, and Lisa says it was a business communication class she took last year. Rachel says she will check it out if it was Lisa's favorite.

label_annotations.factors_a: No, just the disappointing length of it
